attributes.action: For all dogs to wear muzzles and not just xl bully’s
attributes.additional_details: Any dog can attack not just xl bullys, no matter the size and bread of the dog they still attack
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to make all dogs wear muzzles not just xl bullys

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Make all dogs no matter what breed muzzled in public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633198

Require leads, muzzles and licences for all dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638225
